page.title: 07ECOLOGY OF SCHOOL GROUNDS
page.content: {FLOWERS Daisy:White flowers found in gardens and fields,last until summer Buttercup:Flat yellow petals,green stalk,lasts until summer Common Forget-me-nots:Wild flowers found in school field,flowers turn from pink to blue,5 petals, Glory of the Snow:Stem of blue star shaped flowers that grow in Winter and Spring Daffodils:Yellow flowers that grow in the Spring,colour varies. {TREES Crab apple,Lime,Horse Chestnut,Beech, Oak,Ash {INSECTS AND BIRDS Ants,Spiders,woodlice,Moths,Bees, Beetles,Butterflies Rooks,Bluetit(nesting),Starlings, Sparrows,Pied Wagtail,Common Gulls
